title: Blazin Pizza CO.
description: A full-stack JavaScript application (MERN) that I've built in an effort to put all my JS knowledge into a single coherent project. Please see the 'readme' document in the GitHub repo for a full list of features by clicking the 'Code' button below.

title: My Online Portfolio
description: The very page that you're visiting right now is a React application! Even though at its core it's just a static web page, I've chosen this approach to give myself even more of an exposure to React, since React is my choice when it comes to front-end development.
